priority_industries.reason: Strong capability in healthcare analytics, data platforms, and AI-driven decision-support systems with HIPAA-aligned controls. Focus is on non-clinical analytics and operational intelligence rather than regulated clinical decision systems.
Established expertise in compliance-heavy, data-intensive financial systems with strong demand for automation, analytics, and document intelligence.
Technically strong fit for analytics, portals, and automation projects, but often associated with complex procurement, eligibility constraints, and long-term operational commitments.
Consistent demand for analytics, forecasting, and customer-facing AI solutions with moderate sales cycles.
Limited prior delivery experience; bids should be considered only when scope closely matches existing analytics or automation strengths.

project_type_preferences.notes: Core strength; strong alignment with compliance, analytics, and RFP-style workloads
Includes data pipelines, dashboards, and reporting systems
Primarily LLM-driven systems, predictive analytics, and decision-support tools
Accepted when analytics or automation value is clear
Custom systems tied to data, AI, or integration use cases
Accepted when paired with analytics or decision-support outcomes
Instructional design, classroom delivery, and logistics-heavy training programs are out of scope

client_preferences.preferred_relationship: Long-term partnerships preferred over one-off or transactional engagements

automatic_escalation_conditions: Public sector projects with long-term on-site requirements
Healthcare projects involving regulated clinical systems
Budgets above ideal range with compressed timelines

geographic_preferences.notes: On-site delivery outside primary regions may require partners or escalation
